rule.name: dynamic_DropdownField
rule.definition: = load( local!dropDownField_label: "label", local!dropDownField_instructions: "instructions", local!dropDownField_required: {2}, local!dropDownField_disabled: {2}, local!dropDownField_choiceLabels: "[Choice 1][Choice 2][Choice 3][Choice 4]", local!dropDownField_placeHolderLabel: "place holder text", local!dropDownField_value: {1}, with( #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayoutColumns"( label: "Dynamic Sail Component", columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Label", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Label value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!dropDownField_label, saveInto: local!dropDownField_label ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Instructions", instructions: "Enter text for the dynamic Instructions value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!dropDownField_instructions, saveInto: local!dropDownField_instructions ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"( label: "Required", instructions: "Checked=true, Unchecked=false", required: false, disabled: false, choiceLabels: { "True", "False" }, value: local!dropDownField_required, saveInto: local!dropDownField_required ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonFieldByIndex"( label: "Disabled", instructions: "Checked=true, Unchecked=false", required: false, disabled: false, choiceLabels: { "True", "False" }, value: local!dropDownField_disabled, saveInto: local!dropDownField_disabled ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Choice Labels", instructions: "Enter choices in boxes [], eg. [choice5][choice6][etc..]", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!dropDownField_choiceLabels, saveInto: local!dropDownField_choiceLabels ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Place Holder Label", instructions: "Enter the text for the place holder label", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!dropDownField_placeHolderLabel, saveInto: local!dropDownField_placeHolderLabel ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Value", instructions: "Enter number of pre-selected choice for the dynamic Value value", required: false, readOnly: false, disabled: false, value: local!dropDownField_value, saveInto: local!dropDownField_value ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownFieldByIndex"( label: local!dropDownField_label, instructions: local!dropDownField_instructions, required: if( local!dropDownField_required = 1, "true", "false" ), disabled: if( local!dropDownField_disabled = 1, "true", "false" ), choiceLabels: extract(local!dropDownField_choiceLabels,"[","]"), placeholderLabel: local!dropDownField_placeHolderLabel, value: local!dropDownField_value, saveInto: local!dropDownField_value ) } ) } ) ) )
